caption.p: Mean percent inhibition of acetic acid-induced abdominal writhes in mice after treatment with 70% ethanolic leaf extract of H. schulli. The values presented inside the bars are mean of the respective test samples; the error bars represent the standard error of the mean of measurements; n=5 for each group; * P<0.01; ** P<0.001 when compared to distilled water-treated group.
